title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Facebook Utilization Strategies in Social Welfare Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can configure Facebook privacy settings tailored to social welfare contexts.
Learners can identify three or more ethical dilemmas that may arise when using social media.
Learners can design and receive feedback on client communication scenarios via Facebook using role-play methods.
Learners can present step-by-step crisis management strategies for social media use.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
